alert.note: Alert for Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 2:06AM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts. Lesser amounts mainly below 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Utah and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
